3: Two outlines step out of the shadows.
Kamui of Strike Hawk? Heard he's a feisty one, what's he doing like this?
He is currently fighting the virus, and it has taken a toll on his capacity.
When he loses hold, his frame will become empowered by the virus and also begin attacking humans.
If that's so, do you need my help, Bianca?
No, Karenina. As external aid from the Engineering Force, your mission is to ensure the complete destruction of the Punishing Virus factory.
Only your secondary mission is to help us retrieve any corrupted frames.
But, it seems like someone's impeding your work now.
